EmailTemplate.description: SFDC-0488_AuraProvisioningEmailForLanceKajiV1. This field exists to workaround an unplanned salesforce 13+ year old SFDC GA limitation: https://trailblazer.salesforce.com/ideaView?id=08730000000BrUAAA0. The accuracy of this field needs to be recalculated if product names ever change! Rule of thumb: retire products, dont rename them , technically-speaking. This text field exists so that rollups can refer to it, because rollups cannot refer to formula fields. At time of writing we will do a one-time mass update into this field and maintain it with synchronous logic at the OpportunityLineItem level.
EmailTemplate.name: Pbe_Product_Aura_Ent_Provision_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Aura Enterprise Deal reached 'SOPS Review' Stage in Salesforce
